short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prepd Chrome extension for competing while offline

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compete in speech and debate without accessing the Internet. Prepd Offline synchronizes your files when you are connected to the Internet. When you disable the Internet, simply open Prepd Offline and then select a specific app - Library, Extemp, or Congress - and all your files will be there.
